mapper.sql: id, school, userName, userNo, fxTime, fxCountry, fxProvince, fxCity, fxTown, fxVehicle, throughEpidemicArea, trainNum, createTime
mapper.select: SELECT school FROM `yq_fxdata_collection` WHERE school=#{school} AND user_no=#{no};

SELECT COUNT(1) AS fxNum,SUM(IF(fx_addr_country !='中国',1,0)) AS jwfxNum, SUM(IF(fx_addr_province !='河南省',1,0)) AS wsfxNum FROM (SELECT * FROM yq_fxdata_collection WHERE school='山东英才学院' GROUP BY user_no) FXRY

SELECT COUNT(1) AS fx_num,SUM(IF(fx_addr_country !='中国',1,0)) AS jwfx_num, SUM(IF(fx_addr_province !=#{province},1,0)) AS wsfx_num FROM (SELECT * FROM yq_fxdata_collection WHERE school=#{school} GROUP BY user_no) FXRY

SELECT tmp3.user_name AS userName, tmp3.user_no AS userNum, college, fx_addr_province AS originCity FROM ( SELECT tmp2.user_name, tmp2.user_no, college FROM ( SELECT user_name, user_no FROM yq_fxhealth_collection AS tmp1 WHERE school = #{school} and tmp1.heathinfo1 != '00001' and tmp1.id IN ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( group_concat( id ORDER BY `create_time` DESC ), ',', 1 ) FROM yq_fxhealth_collection WHERE school = #{school} GROUP BY user_no )) tmp2 LEFT JOIN yq_student_info ON tmp2.user_no = yq_student_info.user_no ) tmp3 LEFT JOIN yq_fxdata_collection ON tmp3.user_no = yq_fxdata_collection.user_no GROUP BY tmp3.user_no
SELECT fx_addr_province AS originCity,count(1) AS count FROM yq_fxdata_collection WHERE school=#{school} GROUP BY fx_addr_province ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT fx_vehicl AS NAME FROM yq_fxdata_collection AS tmp1 WHERE school = #{school} AND tmp1.id IN ( SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX( group_concat( id ORDER BY `create_time` DESC ), ',', 1 ) FROM yq_fxdata_collection WHERE school = #{school} GROUP BY user_no)

SELECT college AS NAME, count( 1 ) AS count FROM `yq_fxdata_collection` LEFT JOIN yq_student_info ON yq_fxdata_collection.user_no = yq_student_info.user_no WHERE yq_fxdata_collection.school = #{school} AND college != '' AND college IS NOT NULL GROUP BY college;
mapper.insert: insert into yq_fxdata_collection (id, school, user_name, user_no, fx_time, fx_addr_country, fx_addr_province, fx_addr_city, fx_addr_town, fx_vehicl, is_thseriousarea, fxjk, fxjt_sm, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fxcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxtown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxvehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{throughepidemicarea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fxjk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into yq_fxdata_collection (id, school, userName, userNo, fxTime, fxCountry, fxProvince, fxCity, fxTown, fxVehicle, throughEpidemicArea, trainNum, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fxcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxtown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxvehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{throughepidemicarea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

school,
userName,
userNo,

fxCountry,
fxProvince,
fxCity,

mapper.update:
update yq_fxdata_collection
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userNo = #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxTime = #{fxtime,jdbcType=DATE},
fxCountry = #{fxcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxProvince = #{fxprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxCity = #{fxcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxTown = #{fxtown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fxVehicle = #{fxvehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
throughEpidemicArea = #{throughepidemicarea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trainNum = #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yq_fxdata_collection set school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userNo = #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fxTime = #{fxtime,jdbcType=DATE}, fxCountry = #{fxcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fxProvince = #{fxprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fxCity = #{fxcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fxTown = #{fxtown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fxVehicle = #{fxvehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, throughEpidemicArea = #{throughepidemicarea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trainNum = #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
